title: Elon Musk: Tesla, SpaceX, and the Quest for a Fantastic Future
subtitle: Ashlee Vance
content: Elon Musk: Tesla, SpaceX, and the Quest for a Fantastic Future is a biography by Ashlee Vance, published in 2015. Vance provides an in-depth look into the life and career of Elon Musk, the visionary entrepreneur behind companies like Tesla, SpaceX, and PayPal. Through interviews and research, Vance explores Musk's relentless drive, audacious goals, and his quest to revolutionize transportation, space exploration, and renewable energy, making him one of the most influential figures in the modern tech industry.
